info.title: Inventory Management API
info.description: API documentation for the Inventory Management system

get.summary: Retrieve all products for the authenticated user

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the product to update

403.description: Forbidden - User is not authorized to edit this product

message.example: You are not authorized to edit this product

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the product to delete

403.description: Forbidden - User is not authorized to delete this product

message.example: You are not authorized to delete this product

get.summary: Retrieve all product types for the authenticated user

put.summary: Update a product type by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the product type to update

description.example: An updated category for electronic items

403.description: Forbidden - User is not authorized to edit this product type

message.example: You are not authorized to edit this product type

delete.summary: Delete a product type by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the product type to delete

403.description: Forbidden - User is not authorized to delete this product type

message.example: You are not authorized to delete this product type

409.description: The email/username has already been taken.

tags.name: Product Types
tags.description: API Endpoints for managing product types
